Options dealer hedging dynamics at call/put walls
Rate policy uncertainty and earnings guidance weakness
Retail participation decline amid extreme fear readings

QQQ support breach indicates growth equity weakness extending beyond crypto
Earnings guidance deterioration across tech/software sectors per RSS creating fundamental headwind
Retail apathy and depressed participation metrics contradicting extreme fear 'opportunity' narrative
Lack of professional trader data removes highest-conviction directional input
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: $680 immediate support (5k OI), $690 resistance (7k OI). QQQ: $610 put wall support (6k OI). Watch for consolidation between key options strikes given Sunday evening positioning.
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: $670 major put wall support (13k OI) vs $695 call wall resistance (7k OI). QQQ: $610 support vs $635-$640 resistance zone. Bitcoin resistance $93.5k-$94.5k per Twitter; break below would confirm bearish structure.
